SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Elizabeth Peel’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope every child is given the opportunity, the freedom, and the hope to dream…”

– Mrs. Elizabeth Peel, Librarian @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/every-child-opportunity-freedom-hope-dream/
